message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  I'd be willing to pay $105 for it.  What do you think?

I understand you're looking to get a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $108. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
